text:
="preserve">Delfino López Aparicio (9 February 1960 – 20 December 2020) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the National Regeneration Movement. López Aparicio was born in Mexico City. He was a member of the Mexican Chamber of Deputies from 1 September 2018 until his death in 2020.
López Aparicio died on 20 December 2020 at a hospital in Mexico City from COVID-19, aged 60.
